segments.text: Good day ! What can we do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm considering buying a new car , the old one hasn't been running too well recently , and was wondering what kind of credit you can offer me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Buying a new car is a big expense ; we understand that , so we have a variety of loans to suit your needs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's great . I'm looking to borrow quite a large sum , though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With our Personal Automobile Consumer Loan , the borrower can borrow up to 80 % of the purchase price .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's good news . The car I'm interested in is priced at 120,000 RIB , but I think I can get a bit of discount on that . I can afford to put up around 40,000 RIB myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great . You will need to make an initial down payment of 20 % , and then we can get going with this .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The funds are all ready to go in my personal account , so let's transfer it .
segments.speaker: S2
